item.description:
Welcome to CTMatch.com

Our Mission is to provide Connecticut Singles a safe, fun, and exciting way to meet other singles who share common interests, and to connect on a personal level.

In this age of impersonal technology and increased time demands, we find that meeting people is becoming more difficult! And meeting the wrong people is not the best use of your time either?

CTMatch.com works hard to bring local people together in comfortable, safe environments with the focus on having fun AND meeting local singles who may share common interests.

Because you can tell more from talking to someone for 2 minutes rather than emailing or chatting for 2 years, we bring local singles together, and let them decide who they want to spend time with.

We have created many matches from our events, and even more friendships have developed.

CTMatch.com has a wide ranges of age groups attending our events because all age groups are welcome.

Membership is always free, so sign up for our Upcoming Events Email and check out our Upcoming Events See you at the party!

Visit www.CTMatch.com or call (860) 236-3343
item.name: CTMatch Singles Events Music Dance Speed Dating Golf Comedy
